notes:
Is the boss of Warlord level Pit #4.
[[Svoren the Mad|Next #5]]
sounds: I'll crush you beneath my feet!
name: The Pit Lord
strategy:
The Pit Lord has no waves or beams, so you don't need to stand at a diagonal with him.
Druid or Sorcerer: Throw 1-2 wall runes wall and run around them casting [[Ice Strike]] or using [[SD]]. It may be a good idea to use [[Magic Shield]] and/or [[Haste]] in case he moves too fast.
Knight: Melee and [[Berserk]].
Paladin: Use wall runes, shoot and cast [[Divine Missile]].
